p: In December 2019, a cluster of cases of pneumonia with unknown cause was detected in Wuhan City, Hubei Province of China. A novel coronavirus was identified as the causative virus by Chinese authorities on January 7, 2020. The Coronavirus Study Group of the International Committee on Taxonomy of Viruses designated the causative virus as severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), and the disease, which subsequently spread globally, was named coronavirus disease of 2019 (COVID-2019) by the World Health Organization (WHO). In March 2020, the WHO declared COVID-19 a pandemic.
